settings.title: Did you know 3 consecutive cycles of ProLon help maintain lean body mass?
Rejuvenate
settings.description: ProLon enhances your body’s natural processes of cellular clean-up which naturally gets triggered when your body is in a prolonged (3 or more days) fasting state.

settings.title: Weight Loss
settings.description:
ProLon has been tested to help people lose an average of 5 lbs. of fat and 1.2 inches of waist circumference, while preserving lean body mass).*

*Science Translational Medicine – February 2017

settings.title: Nourishing
settings.description: ProLon provides the body with a scientifically developed combination of micro and macro-nutrients designed to keep the body nourished while going through the rejuvenating process of the fasting state.

settings.title: Great Taste
settings.description: ProLon was created in collaboration with some of the world’s best food scientists and chefs to provide delicious food that incorporates the science of FMDs.

settings.title: Convenient
settings.description: ProLon meals come in 5 grab-and-go boxes (one for each day) that include plant-based energy bars, soups, a variety of snacks, drinks, and supplements.

settings.title: Plant-Based
settings.description: ProLon is gluten-free and uses healthy, mostly plant-based ingredients including olives, vegetables, fruit, nuts, seeds, and herbal teas.

settings.title:
Benefits of ProLon®

A better you! ProLon is more than a Fasting Mimicking Diet—it ushers in real physical change by triggering cellular rejuvenation and the clean-up of cellular components.

settings.html:
Fast to Performance

If you are an athlete looking to enhance your performance, ProLon may be right for you. Unlike intermittent fasting, the ProLon Fasting Mimicking Diet® (FMD®) works differently than other fasts to give you all the benefits of a fast while providing essential nutrients to fuel energy levels in the body. With ProLon, athletes are able to maintain more lean body mass while lowering their body fat percentage to support athletic performance.

settings.description:
In addition to the fuel source while fasting, ProLon is the only FMD that still triggers autophagy in the body (intracellular clean-up process) followed by a period of renewal to promote the natural process of rejuvenation throughout the body.

The Fasting Mimicking diet may help athletes:

• Multiple cycles of ProLon® reduces visceral fat while maintaining lean body mass.
